channel.title: CVE Feed for techjewel -- Ninja Tables – Easiest Data Table Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for techjewel -- Ninja Tables – Easiest Data Table Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-7304|2024-08-27T06:48:04.267Z -- techjewel -- ninja%20tables%20%E2%80%93%20easiest%20data%20table%20builder
item.description: The Ninja Tables – Easiest Data Table Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via SVG File uploads in all versions up to, and including, 5.0.12 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file.
